personal.name: Mohamad Tarabishi
personal.title: Senior Mobile Engeineer
personal.shortBio: Hello! I am Mohamad Tarabishi. I make stuff. Here's some of it.

work.title: Senior Mobile Engeineer
highlights: Introduced clean-architecture patterns in Swift adopted across 20+ projects, improving team productivity by ~30%
Developed a security operations system for Saudi Electricity Company to manage internal security processes and workflows

work.title: Senior Mobile Engeineer
highlights: Collaborated with engineers and stakeholders to ship production iOS apps and improvements in iterative releases
Built real-time tracking and booking experiences (e.g., Glamour) enabling beauty-session reservations and in-home expert requests
Designed a barber booking platform for Naeeman Company with simplified online scheduling, reducing customer waiting time by ~15 minutes
Delivered food delivery apps for Bilafeah (Saudi Arabia) and Joaan (Turkey), supporting fast ordering experiences for 1M+ users
Developed a real-estate management app for Ousol enabling users to manage and track real-estate assets from mobile
Created Photon: fitness + nutrition routines with specialist booking, plus video/audio calls and live chat
Built Hunter HCC, a cryptocurrency wallet app for storing and retrieving digital assets
Designed and tested 7+ iOS apps generating ~$1.5M within a 12‑month period
Tools: Swift, SwiftUI, Objective‑C, Xcode, CI/CD, GitHub, GitLab, Asana

work.title: Job with both link to employer site and highlights
highlights: Worked on Model and Simulation of DRAM-PCM Dual Architecture with Dr. Chengmo Yang
Developed simulators for various parts of the architecture
Tested the algorithms and analyzed the results
Presented research findings at research seminar

projects.title: Project with bulleted description
description: Javascript framework that automatically generates a portfolio website from resume data.
Ability to create image galleries for projects.
Ability to choose the order of different sections or skip sections entirely.
Ability to have custom named sections for projects.
Supports all major social networks icon.
The code for this entire site is generated by the framework. Nothing is hardcoded!

projects.title: Project with no link
description: To crete a bulleted list in the pop up
Each bullet item separated by comma

projects.title: Project with long paragraph description
projects.description: To create a paragraph description in the pop up, do not put content in [], just put it everything within the double quotes.
